articles.title: Champions Cup: One change for Tigers, James Ryan back for Leinster - planetrugby.com
articles.description: The teams have been named for the European Champions Cup clash between Leicester Tigers and Leinster at Mattioli Woods Welford Road.
articles.content:
Steve Borthwick has made just one change to the Leicester Tigers XV for their huge Champions Cup quarter-final encounter with Leinster on Saturday.

articles.title: Kendellen and Wycherley start for Munster with Daly set for first European cap - The42
articles.description: Johann van Graan has gone for a settled-looking team with Munster missing several forwards through injury.
articles.content:

articles.title: Why EU’s move to ban Russian oil imports may deepen India’s crude crisis - India Today
articles.description: As the European Union moves to ban Russian oil imports, here is why it may also deepen India’s crude crisis
